__e: So, now, you know, I'm gonna be straight with you, 'cause you know I'm a Christian woman and you are now and always will by my Lord and savior and I will love you until the day I die.
/I'm still afraid but /I want more than anything /to be a good Christian and make you /proud of me.
You're also an old woman, and I'm young and beautiful ... and he wants me!
